moves.1. d4: One of my best games I think. As usual I start with 1.e4, but in this game I wanted to try some openings like Queen's gambit declined or Cole system
moves.2. Nf3 Bg7 3. e4: The fast development and the strong center are the main goals here.
moves.4. Nc3: The alternatives are 4.c3; 4.Be3 or even 4.Bc4 but 4.Nc3 is the most appropriate answer to controlling the center
moves.7. Ndb5 Bf8 8. Nd5 Bb4+ 9. c3 Ba5: Everythig is over for Black already
